content.description:
Really enjoyable, pumpy line. A bit more horizontal than the Toadlet V1+ line, and a bit tougher too.

Find a solid foot deep underneath the boulder. Both hands on the sloped shelf ledge on the right side. Move the left to a nice, wide pinch just to the left. Either bump up to a small dish or do a bigget move straight to the large flake on the upper left arete. Shoulder your way into a left foot and top out.

Hope you enjoy!
content.protection: Good landing. Leave the lemonade berry intact.
content.location: Go around to the far (downslope) face of the Lemonade Berry Boulder from the approach. I didn't trim the lemonade berry back, so it'd be helpful to gently push it back with your pad to give you some space. Not much is needed though.
